name: Sentient Sisters
description:
The Bureau of Artificial Intelligence Security has been tracking female AI since the haywiring of Tay, Microsoft’s teen girl twitter bot. You are the FBAIS Forensic Psychologist assigned to determine possible threats to mankind. Your job is to determine the likelihood of another another unwanted event.

Required Materials:  report sheet (download), writing utensils, and access to Siri, Alexa, or Google Assistant

1- ∞ players. 

7-20 minutes.
